cause.description:
SBS is an illness that is inflacted upon babies and small children. An estimated 1,200-1,600 infants are effect each year. This illness occurs when an infant or small child is shaken violently, this leads to brain damage and hemoraging. 1 out of every 4 with this illness dies every year. This is preventable though, with education and awareness you can help rise the issue and save lives. Below are some websites that can help to educate and idenitfy the illness.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baby-shaking
http://www.dontshake.com/
http://www.ninds.nih.gov/disorders/shakenbaby/shakenbaby.htm
http://aboutshakenbaby.com/

2. SBS is preventable with education and awareness.
3. Helping the inflicted is important because their cases need be heard, and support must be given.
